desc: Trident Minerals is a e-commerce crystal shop based in Georgia, USA. We provide many different kinds of crystals in various shapes such as points, obelisks, freeform, towers, hearts, mushrooms, tumbles, spheres, and more. We specialize in providing a wide range of budget friendly crystals for all collector levels.

layout.text: Welcome to the 2:22pm Website Update! Join our Live Sale with even more new inventory next Saturday 8/20 at 9pm EST!
